Name: Prison Bomber
About the game: Prison Bomber is an oldschool arcade shooter, based on classic 2d action games. Your main goal is to rescue your ally from enemies prison. Fight your way through the mass of enemies and beat the high-score. - multiple stages and enemies - 4K graphics - oldschool style gameplay - controller support - achievements - leaderboards
